title: Ben Wallace – 2021 Comments on UK Carrier Strike Group Deployment
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ben Wallace, the Secretary of State for Defence, on 16 July 2021.
content:
The UK Carrier Strike Group deployment is a major moment for UK defence as we develop this cutting edge capability across the globe.
